name: BoltBreak
description:
Use your Powers, your skill, and your play style as you enter the super arena ready to take down all the enemies patrolling the level.

To help you along your way is a set of superspeed and electrical-based powers gifted to you, to take down the superpowered enemies in multiple ways. You can either go in and kill every enemy with electric attacks, with skills of precision or use a combination of multiple powers to accomplish the goal.

You are a SuperPowered Weapon and you can either be a blur that runs in punches and leaves, electrocutes your foes for a quick kill, or a powerful fast clap that ragdolls any enemy in its path. You also have the ability to freely use multiple powers in combat to achieve a unique playstyle, the choice on how to play is up to you!

Powers:
BoltTime


Lighting Kick


Vortex Fly


ThunderClap


Game features
-Multiple Electricity and Speed Based SuperPowers
-Arena Style Combat
-Multiple Maps
-Super Powered Enemy Types
-Energy and Health systems
-Unique Superhero Model Designs
-Ability Bar System with Power Cooldowns
